rss.channel:
医学新闻来自 News-Medical.Net - 来自世界各地的最新医学新闻和研究https://www.news-medical.net/ en-GB
通过人工智能驱动的瘤内免疫治疗改善患者的治疗效果2024 年 9 月 17 日，Oncotarget 第 15 卷发表了一篇新社论，题为“人工智能在增强肿瘤内免疫治疗护理中的新兴作用”。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Enhancing-病人-结果-with-AI-driven-intratumoral-immunotherapy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Enhancing-病人-结果-with-AI-driven-intratumoral-immunotherapy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=ca9f70df-c484-4af3-b232-f08085697a56 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 22:43:52 -0400 Enhancing patient outcomes with AI-driven intratumoral immunotherapy
获得认可的医院的服务可以改善弱势患者的癌症护理结果面临社会、环境和经济劣势的弱势患者往往比其他群体经历更糟糕的癌症结果。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Access-to-accredited-hospitals-improves-cancer-care-outcomes-for-vulnerable-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Access-to-accredited-hospitals-improves-cancer-care-outcomes-for-vulnerable-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3c021bfc-1549-44a4-ac2e-468966fc3930 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 22:40:09 -0400 Access to accredited hospitals improves cancer care outcomes for vulnerable patients
新工作流程通过适应癌症患者的日常变化来增强质子治疗在癌症患者的治疗中，每天都可以根据肿瘤的位置和身体状况重新调整照射。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/New-workflow-enhances-proton-therapy-by-adapting-to-daily-changes-in-cancer-病人.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/New-workflow-enhances-proton-therapy-by-adapting-to-daily-changes-in-cancer-病人.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=f9a95c1f-d6ba-4aa8-9fbc-1f6ab47f8e87 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 22:32:27 -0400 New workflow enhances proton therapy by adapting to daily changes in cancer patients
研究强调需要改善工作条件以留住急症室医生根据首次关于急诊医生留下而不是离开的原因的研究，必须改善工作环境，以提高急症医生的保留率。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-highlights-the-need-for-improved-working-conditions-to-retain-AE-doctors.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-highlights-the-need-for-improved-working-conditions-to-retain-AE-doctors.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=c491d884-1cfd-4f72-af67-06c5729faf3e Thu, 19 Sep 2024 22:28:27 -0400 Study highlights the need for improved working conditions to retain A&E doctors
初级保健医生面临着日益复杂的心理健康问题对数以百万计的初级保健医生就诊的患者进行的检查表明，在日常护理中，心理健康问题仅次于肌肉骨骼疾病。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Primary-care-physicians-face-rising-complexity-of-mental-health-concerns.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Primary-care-physicians-face-rising-complexity-of-mental-health-concerns.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=87af63e0-a5c6-4b08-87af-403c4f528c27 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 22:21:10 -0400 Primary care physicians face rising complexity of mental health concerns
不明确的日期标签和储存建议导致澳大利亚人的食物浪费一项新的研究显示，由于日期标签和储存建议不明确，澳大利亚人正在浪费食物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Unclear-date-labels-and-storage-advice-contribute-to-food-waste-among-Australians.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Unclear-date-labels-and-storage-advice-contribute-to-food-waste-among-Australians.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=2f761262-3fb8-407b-9e0f-f4ec86a6d1fe Thu, 19 Sep 2024 21:23:00 -0400
研究揭示福克斯内皮性角膜营养不良背后的机制伦敦大学学院研究人员领导的一项新研究揭示了对福克斯内皮性角膜营养不良 (FECD) 背后机制的重要见解，FECD 是与年龄相关的视力丧失的常见原因。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-uncovers-mechanisms-behind-Fuchs-Endothelial-Corneal-Dystropy.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-uncovers-mechanisms-behind-Fuchs-Endothelial-Corneal-Dystropy.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=6b804aca-5f80-4143-93a4-d3d1a5b01be8 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 21:13:23 -0400 Study uncovers mechanisms behind Fuchs Endothelial Corneal Dystrophy
多吃水果和蔬菜以降低虚弱风险研究发现，摄入更多的水果和蔬菜可以显着降低虚弱风险，特别是对于体重不足的人。整个水果和红橙色蔬菜提供最大的保护作用。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Eat-more-fruit-and-vegetables-to-lower-frailty-risk.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Eat-more-fruit-and-vegetables-to-lower-frailty-risk.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=3984da19-1101-49d1-979a-89adbc566783 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:55:00 -0400 Eat more fruit and vegetables to lower frailty risk
研究揭示MYC基因在前列腺癌发生和进展中的作用通过跟踪前列腺癌细胞随时间的变化，约翰·霍普金斯金梅尔癌症中心的研究人员发现，MYC 基因的激活：众所周知的致癌基因——；引发一系列事件，导致疾病的发生和进展。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-MYC-genes-role-in-prostate-cancer-initiation-and-progression.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-MYC-genes-role-in-prostate-cancer-initiation-and-progression.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=21fbb022-5cdc-4678-b318-389123ca6b4d Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:53:00 -0400 Study reveals MYC gene's role in prostate cancer initiation and progression
研究揭示了预测多发性硬化症残疾恶化的生物标志物今天在 ECTRIMS 2024 上发表的一项开创性研究确定了可以预测多发性硬化症 (MS) 残疾恶化的关键生物标志物。 https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-biomarkers-that-predict-disability-worsening-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx https://www.news-medical.net/news/20240919/Study-reveals-biomarkers-that-predict-disability-worsening-in-multiple-sclerosis.aspx#comment https://www.news-medical.net/post.aspx?id=58594c6e-1a75-4859-93de-a519aea7f581 Thu, 19 Sep 2024 20:50:48 -0400 Study reveals biomarkers that predict disability worsening in multiple sclerosis
